title: [Large-Scale] Analysis of Technological and Human Factors to Improve Educational Outcomes: Elementary Mathematics PBL Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and educational management experience
context.additional_context: A customized mathematics education program for corporate elementary education administrators/leaders. Emphasis is placed on comparative analysis of non-verbal communication and technology utilization strategies in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting.

learning_goals: Learners can identify the influence of human factors (nonverbal communication, professionalism, etc.) over technical factors with ≥80% accuracy during project-based educational outcome assessments
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of social media tools in PBL environments and propose ≥3 alternative instructional strategies
Learners can write case-based reports explaining variations in educational effectiveness due to cultural differences
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
